trigger_event: After Rada’s broadcast exposes the Directorate’s secret override chamber, two sets of leaked files land in her hands: one proving BCI-driven resource starvation in poor neighborhoods, the other containing cryptic AI routines hinting at Halden’s secret plan to break Council power.
dilemma: Rada must choose whether to expose years of engineered deprivation and demand justice for marginalized neighborhoods, or launch Halden’s cryptic AI ‘inheritance’ protocols, igniting a city-wide power scramble for a new order.
reason: Both options carry risks: revealing the deprivation files could spark civil unrest and deepen divides, while releasing the AI riddles could plunge the city into unpredictable chaos, testing the limits of grassroots unity and stirring every political faction. Rada’s reporter instincts and rebel leanings push for transparency, but her doubts—shaped by a late-night conversation with Alex, who cautions about chaos without direction—leave her torn between justice and change.
choice_a: Release the resource deprivation files to the public with a call for reparations and open confrontation with the Council.
belief_a: Communities heal only through truth and repair.
Authority must be held publicly accountable.
choice_b: Trigger Halden’s AI inheritance protocol, challenging citizens and Council alike to solve riddles for control of the system, risking chaos for the chance at rebirth.
belief_b: Lasting change needs dismantling of old systems.
People must be forced into new ways of collaborating.
